mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ticket_no) AS rnum, ticket_no, ticket_name, ticket_period, ticket_price FROM ticketmnmt ORDER BY ticket_no
SELECT ticket_no, ticket_name, ticket_period, ticket_price FROM ticketmnmt WHERE ticket_no = #{ticketNo}

SELECT c.cpn_no, c.users_id, c.clist_isn_date, c.clist_use_date, c.ucpn_no, p.cpn_no, p.cpn_name, p.cpn_content, p.cpn_img, p.cpn_price, p.rgst_date, p.start_date, p.end_date FROM couponlist c JOIN coupon p ON c.cpn_no = p.cpn_no WHERE c.users_id = #{authId} AND c.clist_use_date IS NULL AND p.end_date >= SYSDATE
SELECT mem_pass FROM member WHERE mem_id = #{memId}

SELECT rownum as rnum, B.cpn_no, B.cpn_content, B.cpn_price, B.end_date, B.cpn_name, A.clist_isn_date, A.clist_use_date FROM couponlist A, coupon B WHERE A.cpn_no = B.cpn_no and A.users_id = #{authId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM couponlist A JOIN coupon B ON A.cpn_no = B.cpn_no WHERE A.clist_use_date IS NULL AND B.end_date >= SYSDATE AND A.users_id = #{authId}
